item.title: Technik Museum Speyer
item.description: Recently I had the special joy of visiting one of my favourite museums again after I guess about 15 years - the Technik Museum Speyer. For me as a computer guy it’s a welcome diversion to see and study something physical instead of just immaterial thoughts and ideas. With this post I want to give a concise overview of the hightlights of the vast and varied collection of the museum.
